ComicInfo.Summary:
Share the most important moments in Marvel history with young readers-two at a time! In this issue: Captain Marvel finds that she's half-Kree and awakens super powers! Then, Green Goblin's nefarious plans require him to experiment on himself.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Lanna Souvanny | 1 | B | Cover B | Lanna Souvanny | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Agnes Garbowska (a) & Silvana Brys (c) | 3 | Note: The digital edition (4/28/2021) for this issue was released before the print edition.
